lead_paragraph: Jerome A. Cohen, a law professor at N.Y.U., writes that the United States cannot avail itself of arbitration of China’s action under the United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea because it has failed to ratify the convention.

headline.main: China and the Reefs: A Weakness in the U.S. Position
headline.print_headline: China and the Reefs: A Weakness in the U.S. Position

snippet: Jerome A. Cohen, a law professor at N.Y.U., writes that the United States cannot avail itself of arbitration of China’s action under the United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea because it has failed to ratify the convention.
